REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to the standard of care in the treatment of substance abuse disorder
Summary: Requires the standard of care in the treatment of substance abuse disorder be held to the same standard of care as medication assisted treatment.
